english.segment1: you sit and stare out at the sky. and think of ways to fake a smile. but life is never what it seems. sometimes it only takes a while
english.segment2: Chorus: i'm in the way of fallin' down. i won't let you go that far now. i'm in the way of fallin' down. i won't let you go that far now
english.segment4: you think that hope was left behind. i picked it up a mile ago. i am running close behind. so don't give up and don't let go
english.segment6: i'm in the way. i'm in the way. i'm in the way. i'm in the way. i won't let you go now
english.segment8: i'm in the way of fallin' down. i won't let you go that far now. i'm in the way of fallin' down. i won't let you go now
english.segment9: i'm in the way. i'm in the way. i'm in the way
